dialog.stubborn.finis.death_lover.01: Oh. What a unusual sensation... You there, do I know you?
dialog.stubborn.finis.death_lover.02: I get the feeling that this isn't the first time we met.
dialog.stubborn.finis.death_lover.respon: It's just your imagination. I've never been here before.
Indeed. I felt the same §odeja vu§r.
We always see each other in my dreams.
dialog.stubborn.finis.death_lover.1.01: Right. Maybe I'm just feeling lonely. Fair enough.
dialog.stubborn.finis.death_lover.2.01: Oh, wait. Now I remember just who you are.
dialog.stubborn.finis.death_lover.2.02: You're the one that refuses to be ceased.
dialog.stubborn.finis.death_lover.3.01: But that's impossible... As the end of existence, people can't just imagine me.
dialog.stubborn.finis.death_lover.3.02: Oh, wait. Was that a flirt?!
